articles.title: 59-foot Apollo group asteroid to buzz Earth soon, NASA reveals - HT Tech
articles.description: An Apollo group asteroid is on its way towards Earth and may make a close approach to the planet soon, according to NASA. Know its speed, distance, size and other details.
articles.content: NASA has issued details about an asteroid that is expected to fly past Earth at a close distance. The asteroid, given the designation of Asteroid 2021 JA5, is on its way towards Earth and will make i… [+2299 chars]

articles.title: G2 geomagnetic storm hits Earth, sparks auroras in the US - HT Tech
articles.description: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) predicted a few days ago that a CME was on course for Earth, and could hit the planet on September 2. This event has now taken place and it made for an amazing viewing in parts of the US.
articles.content: Over the last few months, we have witnessed several solar storm and geomagnetic storm impacts, and their frequency is likely to increase even more as we approach the solar maximum which could arrive … [+2165 chars]

articles.description: Is it possible to achieve healthy aging through eating? Yeast research points the way to securing better health in our golden years. Scientists from the Babraham Institute suggest an alternative connection between diet and aging, based on studies in yeast. Dr…
